abstract: In this paper, we describe the evolution of architecture of Mail Transfer Agents(MTA). We consider the design of MTA as a sequence of design decisions [10]. Many of the design decisions are examples of security patterns. Thus, this paper is another example of how patterns generate architecture [5].

authors.name: Munawar Hafiz
authors.affiliation: University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign, Urbana, IL

title: Security patterns and evolution of MTA architecture
